description: Bursting with Italian flavours, this healthy risotto gets its interesting texture from slow-cooked pearl barley. The green olives and basil leaves also make great additions to the traditional tomato sauce.
name: Italian Tomato Barley Risotto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir the beans into the risotto and cook for a further 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the olives, making sure they are evenly distributed. Season to taste, garnish with basil leaves, and serve hot.
